name: GoRTS
description:
Game main goal - control more territory than opponent.

Youtube gameplay example

Main features:
- simply control
- multiplayer support over local network and over internet
- stats support at site 4ugui.com
- very fast game, fight time ~ 2-5 min. at 9x9 board
- support 2 speed modes
- interface tuning and remeber windows placement and board zoom size

Gameplay video stream http://afreeca.tv/36881185/v/51088
